TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the Zavodsky District Court of GPE ( “ the ORG ” ) gave an unspecified decision on the claim of the applicant ’s former husband , PERSON , lodged against the applicant for division of their property . By a final ruling of CARDINAL DATE , ORG ( “ the ORG ” , since DATE , ORG ) , ordered PERSON to compensate the applicant for her share of their property .
CARDINAL . In DATE ORG of GPE and ORG invited the applicant to discuss the residence registration of her daughter , O.

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant lodged claims with ORG of Donetsk and ORG seeking division of her common property with ORG There is no indication whether and , if so , how these claims were handled by the courts .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant unsuccessfully tried to have her brothers , PERSON . and GPE . , prosecuted for hooliganism and theft . She was not found to be a civil party to these proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE . and PERSON . lodged a claim against the applicant challenging the validity of their mother ’s will over a house and belongings .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG partly allowed the claim .
CARDINAL . Following a “ protest ” of ORG of DATE , ORG quashed this judgment on DATE and remitted the case to ORG which , ORG DATE partly allowed the applicant ’s claim .

CARDINAL . NORP On DATE ORG upheld this judgment . On DATE the applicant appealed in cassation . On DATE she requested ORG to speed up examination of her case . By a final ruling of DATE , notified to the applicant on DATE , ORG upheld the lower court ’s decisions .

CARDINAL . According to the ORG , DATE and DATE , the applicant filed CARDINAL procedural requests and CARDINAL appeals which all met procedural requirements . Moreover , of the QUANTITY hearings scheduled , CARDINAL were adjourned at the PERSON request , CARDINAL were adjourned at the applicant ’s request , CARDINAL were adjourned due to the PERSON or witness ’s failure to attend , CARDINAL was adjourned due to the applicant ’s failure to attend , CARDINAL was adjourned at the GPE request , and CARDINAL were adjourned for reasons beyond the parties’ control . Overall , due to the applicant ’s requests or her failure to attend , the proceedings were delayed for about eleven moths .
